replies.msg:
Manchester United odds on Mesut Ozil Arsenal transfer slashed

Man Utd are favourites to sign Mesut Ozil from Arsenal in the January transfer window.

Manchester United could be set to heap even more misery on Arsenal in the January transfer window - according to the bookies.

The Reds have already lured Alexis Sanchez away from the Emirates this month, and bookmakers believe they could be set to make a move for his former teammate Mesut Ozil too.


According to Paddy Power, United are now odds on favourites to sign the German playmaker - if he decided to leave this month.

https://www.manchestereveningnews.co.uk/sport/football/transfer-news/man-united-mesut-ozil-arsenal-14201747

replies.msg: Arsenal will have to increase their offer to £25m if they want to sign Jonny Evans from West Brom in January. (Source: Sun Sport)

The 28-year-old striker, who is Arsenal's top target before the January transfer window closes, made his first start for a month on Saturday and played for 90 minutes in Dortmund's 2-2 Bundesliga draw with Freiburg.

But he was booed by a section of his own fans who unfurled a banner which said: "No player is bigger than our club".
